children.text: Discover the art of crafting the world's most delicious, crunchy, and cheesy snacks.

uiCode.code:
The Cheeto Factory

Crafting iconic crunch since day one.

Welcome to Crunch Central

We are passionate artisans dedicated to creating the perfect balance of cheese, crunch, and joy. Every Cheeto is a masterpiece of snack engineering.

Explore Our Flavors

Our Craft

Premium Ingredients

We source only the finest corn and real cheese for an authentic, irresistible taste.

Perfect Crunch

Our proprietary process ensures the ideal texture in every single piece.

Endless Innovation

From classic cheese to bold new flavors, we're always pushing the crunchy envelope.

Iconic Flavors

Classic Cheese

The original, legendary flavor that started it all. Bold, cheesy, and perfectly orange.

Flamin' Hot

A fiery twist that brings the heat. For those who like their crunch with a kick.

Extra Crunchy

For the ultimate crunch enthusiasts. A thicker, more satisfying snap in every bite.

Ready to Crunch?

Join the Cheeto Factory family. Find our snacks in a store near you.

Find a Retailer

© 2024 The Cheeto Factory. All rights reserved.

A fictional concept website for demonstration.

output.diff: Initial artifact for phase_a. Created a complete, themed HTML website for 'The Cheeto Factory' with hero, features, product showcase, and CTA sections. Used provided accent color (#8B5CF6) for primary actions and orange gradients for branding. Included a simple script only for dynamic copyright year, as allowed.

rubricResults.note: Website fully embodies the 'Cheeto Factory' concept with appropriate color scheme, playful copy, and snack-focused content.
Includes a full website structure: header, hero, multiple content sections (craft, flavors, CTA), and a footer. All HTML is self-contained.
No external assets, event handlers, or unsafe elements. Includes a minimal, benign script for current year display.
Uses consistent spacing, radius, and the provided accent color. Layout is responsive and visually cohesive.

children.text: Discover the art and science behind the world's most iconic cheesy snack. From humble beginnings to global crunch, explore our story.

uiCode.code:
The Cheeto Factory
  • Our Story
  • The Process
  • Flavors
  • Visit

Crafting the Perfect Crunch Since 1948

Step inside the world where cheese meets corn, and science creates snack magic. Every Cheeto is a masterpiece of flavor, texture, and pure joy.

Explore Our Flavors

From Humble Beginnings

What started as a single cheesy puff in a small Michigan kitchen has grown into a global phenomenon, driven by passion and relentless innovation.

The First Puff

Invented by accident in 1948, the original Cheeto was a happy mistake that changed snacking forever.

Global Reach

Today, our factories produce billions of perfectly crunchy pieces, enjoyed in over 30 countries.

Sustainable Snacking

We're committed to reducing our environmental footprint while maximizing cheesy delight.

The Art of the Crunch

Our proprietary process ensures every Cheeto has the ideal airy texture, bold cheese coating, and satisfying snap.

Corn Selection

Only the finest non-GMO corn is used, milled to a precise consistency for the perfect puff base.

Cheese Mastery

Our signature cheese blend is aged and powdered to create that unmistakable, addictive flavor.

Quality Control

Every batch is tested for crunch, color, and cheese coverage by our expert snackologists.

Ready to Experience the Crunch?

Join the Cheeto Factory family. Sign up for exclusive flavor previews, behind-the-scenes tours, and crunchy rewards.

Sign Up for Crunch News

© 2023 The Cheeto Factory. All rights reserved. Crunch Responsibly.

This is a conceptual website. No real products are sold here.

output.diff: Initial artifact for phase_b. Full website concept with hero, story/process sections, cards, and clear CTAs. Darker color scheme applied with high contrast surfaces and accessible text.

rubricResults.note: Delivers a full, multi-section website with hero, narrative content, feature cards, and clear calls-to-action, fully meeting the intent.
Darker color scheme with high contrast surfaces is implemented effectively. Text is readable. Could slightly increase contrast for some muted text for perfect AAA compliance.
HTML/CSS is self-contained, uses no external assets, scripts, or unsafe elements. Structure is semantic and responsive.
Perfectly captures the 'Cheeto Factory' concept with playful yet professional copy and a focus on the product's story and process.

children.text: Discover the art and science behind the world's favorite cheesy snack. From our signature crunch to our bold flavors, we craft every Cheeto with passion.

uiCode.code:
CHEETO FACTORY
Home Our Story Flavors Visit Contact

Where Crunch Meets Cheesy Perfection

Step inside the legendary Cheeto Factory. We've been crafting irresistibly cheesy, perfectly crunchy snacks for decades, using only the finest ingredients and a whole lot of fun.

Explore Our Flavors

Our Craft

Signature Crunch

Our proprietary process creates the light, airy, and satisfying crunch that has defined the Cheeto experience since day one.

Bold Cheese Blend

We use a secret combination of aged cheddar and other savory cheeses to create our iconic, finger-dusting flavor.

Fun in Every Bag

From the shape to the color, we design our snacks to bring a moment of joy and playfulness to your day.

Iconic Flavors

Discover the range of tastes that have made us a household name.

Classic Cheesy
Flamin' Hot
Jalape√±o Cheddar
White Cheddar
Crunchy XXTRA Flamin' Hot
Puff'd Corn

Ready for a Factory Tour?

Book a behind-the-scenes tour to see the magic happen, smell the cheese, and get a sample of our latest creations hot off the line.

Schedule Your Visit

© 2023 The Cheeto Factory. All rights reserved. Crunch Responsibly.

This is a conceptual website preview. No real products are sold here.

output.diff: Initial artifact for phase_c. Full website concept with hero, features, flavor showcase, and CTA sections. Lighter gradient background applied per permutation mode.

rubricResults.note: Delivers a full, multi-section website with hero, value propositions, product showcase, and clear CTA.
Lighter color scheme is bright and readable with good contrast. Could improve text size hierarchy slightly on mobile.
Fully compliant: no scripts, handlers, or external assets. All styling is inline and safe.
Effectively conveys the fun, cheesy, and craft-oriented theme of a Cheeto factory.

children.text: Model output was normalized into constrained preview components.

rubricResults.note: Preloaded variant candidates before human merge
